Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment

package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
This package contains the definition for parsers that parse HL7 V2 Groups and Segments defined for the various types of HL7 Messages. It also contains abstract classes for creating new Segment and structure parsers, as well as implementations for segments and structures commonly used in HL7 V2 Immunization messages.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir
    The V2 to FHIR package contains the core code for the IZ Gateway Transformation Service components that perform conversion of HL7 V2 Immunization Messages written according to the CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging to HL7 FHIR Resources conforming to FHIR R4, FHIR US Core V7.0.0, USCDI V4 and the HL7 Version 2 to FHIR Implementation Guide from the January 2024 STU Ballot.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.annotation
     
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
    The converter package contains classes for parsing and converting HL7 V2 messages, segments and datatypes into FHIR Bundles, Resources and datatypes respectively.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.datatype
    This package contains the definition of a DatatypeParser interface, and datatype parsers for more complex datatypes, such as Address, ContactPoint and HumanName.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
    This package contains utility classes for performing V2 to FHIR Conversions.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractSegmentParser
    A SegmentParser parses segments of the specified type.
    AbstractStructureParser
    This is an abstract implementation for StructureParser instances used by the MessageParser.
    DSCParser
    The QID Parser extracts the query tag and query name from the QID segment and attaches them to the Parameters resource.
    ERRParser
    Parse an ERR segment into an OperationOutcome resource.
    EVNParser
    The EVNParser extracts information from the EVN segment and adds it to the ProvenanceResource for the MessageHeader.
    FieldHandler
    A handler for processing field conversions in a Segment of a V2 message.
    IzDetail
    This class is used for parsers that may generate an Immunization or ImmunizationRecommendation resources based on message context clues (e.g., Profiles used or event types).
    MRGParser
    Parser for MRG Segments The MRG segment populates a Patient resource with identifiers and demographics for a patient which would need to be merged into a single patiennt.
    MSAParser
    Parse an MSA segment into MessageHeader and OperationOutcome resources.
    MSHParser
    The MSH Parser creates a MessageHeader Resource for MSH segements.
    NK1Parser
    Parser for NK1 Segments The PV1 segment populates a related person resource
    OBRParser
    ORCParser parses any ORC segments in a message to a ServiceRequest If the message is a VXU or an response to an immunization query, it also produces an Immunization resource.
    OBXParser
    OBXParser parses any OBX segments in a message to an Immunization if the message is a VXU or an response to an immunization query.
    ORCParser
    ORCParser parses any ORC segments in a message to a ServiceRequest If the message is a VXU or an response to an immunization query, it also produces an Immunization resource.
    PD1Parser
    The EVNParser extracts information from the EVN segment and adds it to the ProvenanceResource for the MessageHeader.
    PIDParser
    PIDParser handles PID segments and creates Patient, Account and Related Person resources.
    PV1Parser
    Parser for PV1 Segments The PV1 segment populates an encounter resource
    QAKParser
    Parser for QAK Segments The QAK segment populates OperationOutcome.issue referenced by any generated MessageHeader.response.details with the code from QAK-2 field.
    QIDParser
    The QID Parser extracts the query tag and query name from the QID segment and attaches them to the Parameters resource.
    QPDParser
    The QPD Parser generates a Parameters resource documenting the QPD parameters found in QPD-3 to QPD-* For queries (message type of QBP): The Bundle.entry containing this Parameters resource in Bundle.entry.resource will contain a Bundle.entry.request element with the method set to GET and the url set to the FHIR _search URL which would perform the query.
    RCPParser
    The RCP Parser updates the Parameters resource generated by the QPDParser to include the count of records requested.
    RXAParser
    RXAParser parses any RXA segments in a message to an Immunization if the message is a VXU or an response to an immunization query.
    RXRParser
    RXRParser parses any RXR segments in a message to an Immunization if the message is a VXU or an response to an immunization query.
    StructureParser
    This is the base interface for parsers of HL7 Structures (segments and groups).
